alert.note: Alert for Davis; Salt Lake; Tooele (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued February 28 at 12:42AM MST until February 28 at 1:45AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... West central Salt Lake County in northern Utah... Southwestern Davis County in northern Utah... Northeastern Tooele County in northern Utah... * Until 145 AM MST * At 1241 AM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located 8 miles west of Delle, or 27 miles northwest of Grantsville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow and gusty winds leading to blowing snow and visibility rapidly falling to less than one-quarter mile. Wind gusts greater than 35 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 52 and 102. Locations impacted include... Stansbury Park, Delle, Lake Point, and Erda. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow Down! Rapid changes in visibility and road conditions are expected with this dangerous snow squall. Be alert for sudden whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...RADAR INDICATED
